data.text: Mumtogole Mkulu Nguluwi, hemwe vilumbigwe vya kilanga,
Muwikule ukulu wa itagwa lya Mkulu Nguluwi.
Lizi lya Mkulu Nguluwi lwanguhulikwa mchanya mwa bahali,
Lizi lya Mkulu Nguluwi lina mong'ho,
Lizi lya Mkulu Nguluwi lyangubena migodi mikulu,
Kangwambuzaga limachinyhina kuli vidunda vya Lebanoni,
Lizi lya Mkulu Nguluwi lyangulavyaga lumwemwesa.
Lizi lya Mkulu Nguluwi lyangukudita kugunuche kukakame,
Lizi lya Mkulu Nguluwi lyangutigasa migodi ja kumhulo,
Mkulu Nguluwi ndo yalingulongoza mchanya mwa mazi tendema,
Mkulu Nguluwi yawape mong'ho wanhu wa heye.
